title: that bola .25 second delay fucking sucks
body: Its buggy and annoying to deal with please remove it. You have nerfed rengar enough atleast let me keep my mid air bola. I dont want it to be a .125 second delay like on the pbe notes i just want it removed.

I agree, I can agree with damage nerfs but completely gutting an aspect of a champion's kit is just pathetic.

The least Riot could do is give Rengar a decent rework.
A lot of people asked for this because Kha'Zix got the same treatment, but all it did was make 2 champions clunky, instead of fixing either of them.

The problem was kha was legimately broken back then, basically pick/ban in competitive and raping soloqueue.

Rengar as an assassin was never picked in competitive and had a 50% winrate.
Rengar has seen competitive play, what are you on? Did you miss the big, obvious lion on the Samsung White Splash art?

The key words are:

Full damage assassin rengar.

Full AD rengo has been picked I think ONCE in the last 2 years of competitive play.

Dandy built feral and randuins, maybe ghostblade.  But he was never played as a full AD oneshot assassin.  He was just played because his ganking ability with the emp bola snare was really valuable.

Your exact words were "Rengar as an assassin was** never **picked in competitive." And yo, Dandy assassinated dudes.

And since we're getting pedantic, the fact that he was played full AD ever, which isn't even part of what you said, proves your first point wrong. That's how the word "never" works. As in, not even once.
